description: This file defines a module that provides access to chat message data stored in a MongoDB database, including functions for retrieving the chat collection and fetching recent messages for a specific chat room.

methods.name: chatCollection
methods.description: Returns the chat_messages collection from the MongoDB database.

methods.name: findRoomChat
methods.description: Retrieves recent chat messages for a specified room, with optional limit, sorting messages in ascending order by creation time.
